plot: Roger and Shane, hitmen as slick as they are lethal, turn their sights on each other while a blonde balletic interloper complicates the chess match.
title: Opportunities for Advancement
plot_es: Roger and Shane, hitmen as slick as they are lethal, turn their sights on each other while a blonde balletic interloper complicates the chess match.
plot_en: Roger and Shane, hitmen as slick as they are lethal, turn their sights on each other while a blonde balletic interloper complicates the chess match.
